snippet.title: Aethermancer - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Monster Taming meets Roguelite. 
Support the devs and wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2288470/Aethermancer/

Become the Aethermancer and fight alongside mythical creatures. Explore the ever-changing Fractured Ruins. Plan your moves in challenging turn-based battles utilizing the four elements of Aether. Watch your Monsters grow stronger from previous lives and defy death!

Join the community and follow the development: 
https://discord.gg/9kjbKjT5WS
